Package imagingbook.parboiled.common

Class Reference<T>

java.lang.Object
imagingbook.parboiled.common.Reference<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
Direct Known Subclasses:
Var
public class Reference<T> extends Object
A simple container holding a reference to another object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Reference()
    Create a new Reference with a null value.
    Reference(T value)
    Create a new Reference to the given value object.
